member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the Umbraco component that generated the exception.

member.summary: Gets a message that describes the current exception.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlHelperException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,umbraco.DataLayer.IParameter[],System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The method where the exception occurred.
The command text. Only used in debug mode.
The command parameters. Only used in debug mode.
member.remarks: *Never* place the command text inside the exception message, since the message could be shown on a level with lower security. Especially dangerous with faulty command texts (code injection), or commands with inline parameters. (information leak) (So there's another reason to use real parameters.)

member.summary: Original tokens for query token replacement.

member.summary: Destination tokens for query token replacement.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that performs the specified token translation.
member.param: The new tokens, each token corresponds with the item of srcTokens at the same index.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the query, performing provider specific changes.
member.remarks: The default implementation returns the original query. Overriding classes can change this behavior.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.ApplyParameters(System.String,umbraco.DataLayer.IParameter[])
member.summary: Replaces parameters in a query by their values.
member.returns: The query, with parameter placeholders replaced by their values.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.ReplaceIdentifierTokens(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces tokens before or after identifiers in a query string.
member.returns: The query with replaced identifier tokens.
member.remarks: Assumes a correct query.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.UppercaseIdentifiers(System.String)
member.summary: Uppercases the identifiers in the query, leaving strings untouched.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.FindStringEndPosition(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches the position in a query where a string is terminated.
member.param: The position of the opening quote of the string.
member.returns: The position of termination quote of the string.
member.remarks: Assumes a correct query, 0<startPos<query.Length-1 and query[startPos]=='\''. (because the function is optimized for speed)
member.exception: If the query is incorrect, startPos not in ]0,query.Length-1[ or query[startPos]!='\''.

member.name: P:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.StringDelimiter
member.summary: Gets the character strings are surrounded with.

member.name: P:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlParser.ParamToken
member.summary: Gets the param character parameters start with.

member.name: M:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlHelpers.MySql.MySqlParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the query, performing provider specific changes.
member.remarks: Uppercases identifiers and replaces their tokens.

member.name: P:umbraco.DataLayer.SqlHelpers.MySql.SqlResources.Total
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to /*******************************************************************************************
Umbraco database installation script for MySQL
